text: Hagi nahigeta tamagra Isipi mopafima emanineta tamazanteti'ma avako'ma huta tro'ma haza zamo'ene, ru anumzantaminte'ma ofama hazazamo'a Nagrira nazeri narimpa ahe'naze? Ana hu'nagu tamagra'a tamazeri havizantfa hanage'za, ru moparega vahe'mo'za neramage'za kizazokago ke huneramante'za, ha' vahezamima sifnagema huzmante'nakura, Juda vahe'mo'zama havizama hu'nazaza huta haviza hiho hu'za huzamantegahaze.
